td.content: s:patient describes recurrent moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes over the past month. The pt reports moderate reduced peripheral vision, moderate night blindness. pt is a female aged 40 years. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 92.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 18 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered contrast sensitivity testing.

td.content: s:white female aged 40 Ys presents with moderate reduced peripheral vision, moderate night blindness and moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes x 6 weeks. denies any smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 176 cm, Weight 90.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 13 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered contrast sensitivity testing.
